snippet.title: RIGS Mechanized Combat League | Rough Justice Knockout Ability | PlayStation VR
snippet.description:
Pilots of Rough Justice go into battle with the knowledge that they can cancel any other player's overdrive with a swipe of their melee attack.

Rough Justive is just one of the RIGS you can pilot in RIGS: Mechanized Combat League, exclusively on PlayStation VR from 13th October. Find out more: http://bit.ly/2bB3RlO

Preorder now: http://bit.ly/2cMZeBs
